author: Patrick Cc:
description:
Comedy podcasts used to be an escape from politics.. a place for ridiculous stories, wild banter, and jokes. But as politics started driving up view counts, many of the biggest shows shifted into long winded political debates.. blurring the line between comedy and news. This video dives into how comedians became unlikely political voices and whether fans are losing the comedy they came for in the first place.

0:00 Joe Rogan
10:37 Andrew Schulz
17:45 Theo Von
21:43 Tim Dillon
33:09 Bad Friends

title: WTF Happened to Comedy Podcasts?
